methods.description: The Single Validation API does validation on a single email address and returns all the validation results in either JSON or XML format.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Return the result in json (default) or xml format.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email address to be validated.

apiDescription: The Single Validation API does validation on a single email address and returns all the validation results in either JSON or XML format. Refer to https://www.mailboxvalidator.com for further information.
